price: Hao, makaazi yao ni Motoni kwa sababu ya waliyo kuwa wakiyachuma.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ مَأۡوَىٰهُمُ ٱلنَّارُ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ
footnotes: Watu hao, makaazi yao watakapo dumu ni Motoni. Hayo ni malipo kwa waliyo yachuma ya ukafiri na vitendo viovu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: ulāika mawāhumu al-nāru bimā kānū yaksibūna
